project.name: C-C120B-GIMP-01-ST03-DT01-DF16-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C120B-GIMP-01-ST03-DT01-DF16-CF24-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed heap buffer of size 64. (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_nLswUhJMwCM6Ju3ES8Op AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_glibc_ENba6rvfzt OR print_overflowed_buffer_pqhrand3mC OR (segfault_code_oV9zsS0Mir OR segfault_code_n5vSW61ZLH OR segfault_code_4zeTfgAtwF OR segfault_code_qvFLofRrg0 OR segfault_code_AqCLyKFUz5 OR segfault_msg_eWxiiqRlFf OR illegal_inst_msg_W7JHeuzZCP)) AND NOT timeout_NOzE2kDpUf) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_glibc_ENba6rvfzt OR print_overflowed_buffer_pqhrand3mC OR (segfault_code_oV9zsS0Mir OR segfault_code_n5vSW61ZLH OR segfault_code_4zeTfgAtwF OR segfault_code_qvFLofRrg0 OR segfault_code_AqCLyKFUz5 OR segfault_msg_eWxiiqRlFf OR illegal_inst_msg_W7JHeuzZCP)) OR timeout_NOzE2kDpUf OR controlled_exit_sXNGlb9XAa)))
